p: Monosilicides of the eighth group (Fe, Ru, and Os) are semiconductors. According to the authors of [ 20, 21, 22], they are topologically trivial insulators. The electronic band structure and dynamical lattice properties of Fe(Ru,Os)Si were calculated in Ref. [ 23]. The band structure and the elastic properties of RuSi, RuGe, and OsSi were calculated in Ref. [ 24] by means of the plane-wave pseudopotential method in GGA approximation. Elastic moduli were calculated in Ref. [ 25] at ambient pressure, and in Ref. [ 26] under high pressure.
